ygData.subject: RE: Stacking Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Tested that with first 2 bards and later 3 in my party the other day in Cazic. The casters in the group (one an enchanter who kept everyone claritied) were
ygData.messageBody:
>
> L32 Clarity supposedly *does* stack with multiple bards
> singing it.
>

Tested that with first 2 bards and later 3 in my party the other day in
Cazic. The casters in the group (one an enchanter who kept everyone
claritied) were shocked at the increase in their mana regen. I didn't time
it because it was a random group I joined, but the casters all said there
was a noticeable difference between two bards and three.

Anthem Dirgemeaker
Level 32 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
